title: Dove Cameron
summary: Dove Olivia Cameron[1][2] (born Chloe Celeste Hosterman; January 15, 1996[3]) is an American actress and singer, who played a dual role as the eponymous characters in the Disney Channel comedy series Liv and Maddie,  for which she won the Daytime Emmy Award for Outstanding Performer in Children's Programming. She has also portrayed Mal in the Descendants film series. As a singer, Cameron made her debut with the soundtrack album to Liv and Maddie (2015). In the same year, she released her debut single, "If Only", for Descendants. Her debut EP, Bloodshot / Waste, was released in 2019.
